text:
@HHSGov @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse TRUMP’S MAR-A-LAGO NATIONAL CEMETERY

Over 123,000 ready to be interred.

Pile the bodies on the lawn like they did with #RobertELee during the Civil War ... that’s how his home became @ArlingtonNatl Cemetery.

#COVID19 #SlowTheTestingDownPlease
